Registry of Open Data on AWS

Usage examples for all datasets listed in the Registry of Open Data on AWS tagged with elevation.

Terrain Tiles

Tutorials
  • Using GDAL to Produce a Geotiff for an Area by Chris Henrick
Tools & Applications
  • EOS Land Viewer by Earth Observing System
  • Mapzen Terrain Tiles on AWS Reader by Safe Software
  • On The Go Map by On The Go Map
  • Open-Source Elevation Service by Racemap
  • PlanetUtils (GitHub): Scripts and a Docker container to download, merge, and resample terrain tiles by Interline Technologies
  • PODPAC: Python Library supporting TerrainTiles for analysis by Creare
  • R package for accessing Terrain Tiles by Jeffrey W. Hollister
  • Sentinel Hub WMS/WMTS/WCS Service for DEM by Sinergise
  • Sentinel Playground for DEM by Sinergise
  • Terradactile: Generate DEM and hillshade Cloud Optimized GeoTIFFs for visualization and download based on terrain tiles by Sparkgeo
Publications
  • Interactive Visualization of 3D Terrain Data Stored in the Cloud by Gregory Larrick, Yun Tian, Uri Rogers, Halim Acosta, and Fangyang Shen

USGS 3DEP LiDAR Point Clouds

Tutorials
  • Extracting buildings and roads from AWS Open Data using Amazon SageMaker by Yunzhi Shi, Tianyu Zhang, and Xin Chen
    SageMaker
  • Using Lambda Layers with USGS 3DEP LiDAR Point Clouds by Howard Butler
    Lambda
  • WebGL Visualization of USGS 3DEP Lidar Point Clouds with Potree and Plasio.js by Connor Manning
Tools & Applications
  • Facebook Line of Sight Check by Facebook
  • OpenTopography access to 3DEP lidar point cloud data by OpenTopography
Publications
  • USGS 3DEP Lidar Point Cloud Now Available as Amazon Public Dataset by Department of the Interior, U.S. Geological Survey

Prefeitura Municipal de São Paulo (PMSP) LiDAR Point Cloud

Tools & Applications
  • Entwine by Hobu, Inc.
  • Fusion by US Department of Agriculture - Forest Service
  • LAStools by rapidlasso GmbH, GERMANY
  • PDAL - Point Data Abstraction Library by PDAL Contributors
Publications
  • Describing the Vertical Structure of Informal Settlements on the Basis of LiDAR Data – A Case Study for Favelas (Slums) in Sao Paulo City by S. C. L. Ribeiro, M. Jarzabek-Rychard, J. P. Cintra, H.-G. Maas

Tools & Applications
  • EO Browser by Sinergise
  • Sentinel Hub WMS/WMTS/WCS Service and Process API by Sinergise

New Jersey Statewide LiDAR

Tutorials
  • 3D Visualization by stephanie.bosits@tech.nj.us

If you want to add a dataset or usage example to this registry, please follow the instructions on the Registry of Open Data on AWS GitHub repository.
